content.question: During Reconstruction, which of following was a change that took place in the South?

choices.label: Many African Americans found manufacturing employment.
Many White Southerners supported African Americansâ€™ rights.
African Americans favored the Democratic Party.
African Americans were able to exercise political rights.

content.answer: African Americans were able to exercise political rights.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
